extendedInfo.description: Use your fingers to build wood bridges and let the vehicles cross them. Use as less material as you can to get the highest score. This PRO version includes 38 stages.Here are the included new features:- Much better physics simulation. Now the wheels are pushing the vehicles.- Vehicles with rotating wheels.- Stress alerts (beams turn into red when the tension limits are reached)- Slightly elastic bridges.- Construction beams with visible connecting nodes- Better graphics- More cars and trains- Floating rafts- Variable max beam lengths- Load/save bridges to SDCard- Save screenshot of the bridge to SDCard- Novice/expert game modes (expert mode with heavier vehicles)Solutions will be available soon at: http://www.edbasoftware.com*** Change Log ***1.0.0 - Initial version: 10 stages1.1.0 - 1 new stage (11 now)1.1.1 - Reset bugfix1.2.0 - 1 new stage (12 now)1.2.1 - Stage 12 bugfix1.3.0 - 1 new stage (13 now)1.4.0 - 1 new stage (14 now)1.5.0 - 1 new stage (15 now)1.6.0 - 1 new stage (16 now); new train1.7.0 - 1 new stage (17 now);1.8.0 - 1 new stage (18 now);1.10.0 - 2 new hard stages (20 now);1.11.0 - 1 new stage (21 now);1.12.0 - 1 new stage (22 now);1.13.0 - 1 new stage (23 now);1.14.0 - 1 new stage (24 now);1.15.0 - 1 new stage (25 now);1.16.0 - 1 new stage (26 now);1.17.0 - 1 new stage (27 now);1.18.0 - 1 new stage (28 now);1.28.0 - 10 new stages (38 now);

reviews.title: Bad, bad, bad,
reviews.comment: Ya, the wheels rotate, but the game is terrible, don\'t bother, there is no entertainment value to this game, the comments about not enough resources to even build a bridge are correct, this is connect stix at best, want a refund
reviews.author: Rob Tokar

reviews.title: Dont buy
reviews.comment: There are almost no anchor points on any of the bridges so about 90% of the stages you cant make, the bridges are repetitive and nearly impossible for anyone but the makers of the game to beat, dont buy!
reviews.author: Alan Sharpe

reviews.title: No bugs but
reviews.comment: I regret buying this game. The level design seems quickly put together. For example, you\'ll be putting down track from one side to another and when you get to the other side the piece you wanted to reach the end doesn\'t so instead you have to create one more little one  which is just a pain. Also the lack of anchor points? Is that just me
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: DC
reviews.comment: DONT BUY waste of money keeps crashing.  Only  had it for a day have to uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Really challenging and fun! More levels please
reviews.author: A Google User
